QuestData.Title: Return to the Stead
QuestData.Description: You carefully close the spigot in the control panel, watching the cauldron's putrid ichors drip into the empty bottle.$B$BWith the poison in hand, it is time to return to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Filled Gahrron's Withering Bottle to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Gahrron's Withering houses a viciously potent plague cauldron. Once we have a sample of the plague it spews forth, we will be able to determine whether the Cult of the Damned is truly responsible for continuing to poison the land.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work. One moment please...$b$b<The draenei takes a moment to compare your sample with a sample he presumably had distilled earlier.>$b$bYes, this appears to be the same corruption that is affecting the wildlife. With this knowledge, and with your combat expertise, we may have the power to stop this.
